pages.text: Everyone knows that you can sleep in a bed to pass the night, but there's a couple of other ways to rest your weary head. If you're feeling lazy, and want to pass the day to get to your busy night life, you can rest in a $(item)Hammock$().$(br)To setup a hammock, you need a 4 block long space between two vertical surfaces, and 2 $(item)Rope and Nails$().

pages.title: Hammock Setup
pages.text: First, place the 2 $(item)Rope and Nails$(), and then use the $(item)Hammock$() on one of them.
